item.title: Words and sentences: given by Griet
item.summary: Griet gives words in her language to Lloyd in Mowbray, mostly concerning parts of the body and animals.
item.comments: 1) p.1 opp: 'Makas is, Piet says, Griet's other name', and another genealogical note, 2) pp.2 opp-4 opp have one word notes on them, some with Jantje's name next to them, 3) p.5: "Stal" is 'another place where Griet lived', 4) This story is found in Kora Book I-1
item.author: Griet

keyword.subkw: Kora names for parts of the body
